titleStmt.title: Severall informations and examinations taken concerning Lieutenant Colonell Iohn Lilburn, shewing his apostacy to the party of Charles Stuart: and what his intentions are in coming over into England out of Flanders.
titleStmt.author: Berkenhead, Isaac.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills, and for G. Calvert and T. Brewster, and are to be sold at the Black-spread Eagle and the three Bibles at and near the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Five testimonies signed by Isaac Berkenhead, John Tytus, John Bartlet, Richard Foot, and John Staplehill.
Reproductions of the originals in the University of Illinois Library (Early English books 1241:6) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts E.705[14]).
